This library is built on top of fastai(v2) to support my implementations. This library is built on top of fastai(v2) to support my implementations. " ---

{% endraw %}

The github repository holds application notebooks.

Installation

latest release 

pip install fast-impl

From git repository (for changes not released yet) 

pip install git+https://github.com/Kshitij09/fast_impl
